Introduction
Marcelo Arana currently works at the National University of Río Cuarto and the Institute of Earth Sciences, Biodiversity and Environment (ICBIA), Argentina. Marcelo works mainly on Diversity, Taxonomy, Systematics and Biogeography, especially of lycophytes and ferns, and the interactions that plants establish with other organisms.
